dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You trespass upon the realm of the dead, interloper. What business do you have here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about the afterlife.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Mortals are fools chasing shadows. Leave now before you become one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Your curiosity may lead you to your doom, but it will not be at my hands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened by a mere spirit!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one who will soon join the ranks of the departed. Prepare for oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking power to control the spirits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power? You dare to think you can control what you cannot comprehend? Arrogance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my disrespect, I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your apology means nothing in the realm of the dead. Begone before I decide to end your existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down! I will take what I seek by force!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you invite your own destruction. Face the wrath of the spirits!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the rulers of the underworld.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge? Your bravado is laughable. The rulers of the underworld are beyond your comprehension.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, I will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. The underworld is no place for the living. Depart while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear nothing! I will face any challenge head-on!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your fearlessness will be your undoing. Face the wrath of the denizens of the afterlife!
